definition: life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
one's days are numbered/not to have long to live (often fig.)

sentences.english: Stellite 6 seating faces for long service life.
sentences.chinese: 鎢鉻鈷合金6閥座面，使用壽命更長。

sentences.english: After making some simplifying assumptions, this paper obtains the fatigue life of steel towers.
sentences.chinese: 在作了一些簡化假設後，得到了鋼塔架疲勞壽命。

sentences.english: An excellent antioxidant anticorrosive performance, prolongs the service life of the equipment.
sentences.chinese: 優良的抗氧防鏽性能，延長設備使用壽命。

sentences.english: Most conjoined twins have a very short life-span.
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒大多數都壽命很短。

sentences.english: The stainless steel shell with protection film ensures longer service life.
sentences.chinese: 優質不鏽鋼板外殼貼膜保護，壽命更長。

sentences.english: What's the life expectancy of a grave digger in central Hubei province?
sentences.chinese: 湖北省的掘墓者的壽命有多長？

sentences.english: Female tigers in the wild can live up to 15 years averagely.
sentences.chinese: 野生雌虎的壽命大約是15年，平均能產下5窩虎仔。

sentences.english: Consquently, the present invention has a more practical value compared with the existing life testing method.
sentences.chinese: 因而它和現有壽命試驗相比有更加實用的價值。

sentences.english: But, he said, new research could help extend our lifespan.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他說，新的研究可能會幫助我們延長壽命。

sentences.english: High temperature rated grease is standard for extended bearing life.
sentences.chinese: 高溫潤滑脂是標準的額定延長軸承壽命。

sentences.english: The property of the reference electrode can be maintained for long term; namely the service life is extended.
sentences.chinese: 能長期保持參比電極的性能延長使用壽命。

sentences.english: Has a high ripple current, LOW ESR and long life characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 具耐紋波電流，低ESR及高壽命之特性。

sentences.english: Each oil tung flower has one day-long of life.
sentences.chinese: 每朵油桐花都只有一天的壽命。

sentences.english: The chuck, in a sealed construction, may work for long life with wear-resistant parts.
sentences.chinese: 卡盤結構封閉式，零件耐磨損，使用壽命長。

sentences.english: In this case, prolongation of life should trump reproduction.
sentences.chinese: 既然這樣，延長壽命就要重於繁衍後代。

sentences.english: Extend the life of shoes by repairing the  soles.
sentences.chinese: 釘鞋掌還能延長鞋子的壽命。

definition: Yanchang county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
Changshou suburban district of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
